requirements.target_audience: Full stack TypeScript developers with above-middle technical expertise level - focused on advanced patterns, modern development practices, performance optimizations, and architecture decisions
requirements.key_message: Use AI for planning and executing complex tasks with small verifiable steps
requirements.goal: Enable viewers to confidently attempt Obsidian plugin monorepo migration on their own
requirements.context: Internal training recorded video focused on teaching how to migrate an Obsidian plugin to a monorepo structure
requirements.technical_specifics: Main concept: pnpm workspaces + turborepo + tsup. Use AI for migration planning with latest tool releases. Demonstrate LLM heavy lifting with documented steps. Demo: Project git history as transformation example. CTA: Plan your first migration with AI.

content.title: AI-Powered Monorepo Migration: From Plugin to Production

sections.title: Migration Nightmare?
sections.content: Ever stared at a complex refactoring task and thought 'Where do I even start?'

sections.title: The Monorepo Solution
sections.content: Transform your Obsidian plugin into a scalable monorepo using pnpm workspaces + Turborepo + tsup

sections.title: AI Does the Heavy Lifting
sections.content: Let AI plan your migration with step-by-step guidance, latest tool releases, and expert explanations

sections.title: Your Migration Starts Now
sections.content: This project shows it's possible. Go plan your first migration with AI.
